summary: A psychotic young man returns to his old neighborhood after release from prison. He seeks out the woman he previously tried to rape and the man who protected her, with twisted ideas of love for her and hate for him.
cast: Jodie Foster|Tim Robbins|Todd Graff|John Turturro|Michael R. title: Cinco esquinas
